name: The Blackout
description:
Another blackout has happened in the town of Sebastian. This isn’t unusual. This far out in the country, it was bound to happen during hurricane season. Except… something is lurking in the dark.

--

The Blackout is an adaptation of the unpublished short story by PurpleTurtle. Permission was given to adapt this to game format.

--

Credits
  • Art and programming - Red Lily
  • Story - PurpleTurtle
  • Main theme - "Unnatural Situation" by Kevin Macleod
  • Additional SFX - Freesound.org
  • Stock photography from Freepik.com
